title: What To Do If You Catch Your Partner Snooping On You
description: Sep 12, 2016   If you catch your partner snooping on your emails and texts, it is probably a good idea to get curious and find out what your spouse is worried about, Shlomo Slatkin, who founded the ...

title: 15 Relationship Experts Explain Why Snooping Is A ... - Bustle
Snooping on your spouse - Its terrible negative impact in ...
description: You resort to snooping on your spouse, only when there is no basic trust in your marriage. You dont snoop on your spouse when you trust him\her. Trust and faith in your spouse is very important for your marriage to survive. Suspicion in married life is very dangerous as it can totally destroy your relationship.

title: Suspicious Of Your Partner? Here's A Tip: Don't Snoop!
description: Jul 08, 2018   It's so tempting to snoop on your partner... but it's such a bad idea. ... Why Its Counterproductive to Snoop When Youre Suspicious of Your Partner. Psych Central. Retrieved on April 25 ...

title: My Spouse Is Hiding Something From Me - Marriage Helper
description: The hard truth is your spouse will be mad at you even if it doesnt seem fair or logical. The fact that you snooped will cause your spouse to focus on what you did (not what theyre doing wrong). Most likely, this will not provide opportunities to work on your relationship, as your spouse will be focusing on their hurt and anger.

title: My Husband Is Spying on Me | PairedLife
description: Mar 07, 2017   Withdrawal. If your husband or wife withdraws from you and appears to be lost in their own thoughts. On its own, this is not a reason for divorce but added to some other behaviors will indicate that their mind is not on you. Sex becomes less frequent. Excuses seem hollow. S/he is glad when its over.

title: How to Tell if Your Spouse Is Snooping on Your iPhone or iPad ...
description: Even though its sneaky, unethical, and possibly illegal, spouses in South Carolina and elsewhere continue to snoop and spy on each other when facing a separation or divorce. If you believe that your spouse is snooping through your iPhone or iPad to look at your call log, messages, email, or other apps, you can set a simple trap of sorts to potentially catch such intrusions on your privacy.

title: Some Reader Perspectives on Snooping after an Affair
description: The other day a young woman, who just discovered her husbands affair a couple of months ago, shared some of her story with us. One thing she mentioned is that she is having this incredible urge to snoop on her husband. Primarily by checking out his phone and computer every chance she gets. Snooping after an affair is quite common and the ...

title: Is it ever OK to snoop on your partner? - CNN
description: May 26, 2015   Here's a scenario to consider: Your partner leaves his/her cell phone on the dining room table. Their texts/emails can be easily accessed. Do you look?

title: 5 reasons you should STOP snooping on your Spouse - The ...
description: Mar 22, 2016   Its much better to face your fears and suspicions openly. Youll feel better about yourself if you ask, and dont snoop. 5. It sets a bad example for your kids and extended family. When snooping comes out, especially if your spouse is innocent, it makes you look bad to everyone. So fess up- do you snoop on your spouse?

title: The Dangers of Spying and Snooping on Your Spouse
description: Spying and snooping on your spouse can create a lot of marital discord. However, many people admit that they frequently check up on their spouse's activities! It's important to take a look at the damage that your behaviors may be causing to the relationship if you find yourself spying on your spouse.

title: My husband keeps snooping through my stuff & wrongly accusing ...
description: Nov 18, 2008   of things that I don't do... Yesterday he went through my purse while I was sleeping, found phone numbers (which were my neighbors that my landlord gave me for emergency) and he went off on me accusing me of cheating. I put my foot down and told him this was not ok to go through my stuff and wrongly accuse me and to respect my privacy. Then this morning I found my email had been hacked into ...

title: Yours & Mine: Respecting Personal Privacy in Your Relationship
description: Your partner has every right to feel violated if youve snooped. And so do you. Theres a feeling of mistrust, betrayal, and accusation that goes with it. If you feel the need to snoop, theres a problem. And if youre with someone that feels the need to snoop through your stuff, theres a problem. Its a problem of trust.
